text: This is a List of Privy Counsellors of the United Kingdom appointed between the accession of King Edward VIII in 1936 and the death of King George VI in 1952. The only current member appointed during this period is Prince Philip (appointed in 1951). ==Edward VIII, 1936== *Sir Muhammad Saleh Akbar Hydari (1869–1942) *Sir George Rich (1863–1956) *The Duke of Norfolk (1908–1975) *Michael Joseph Savage (1872–1940) *The Earl De La Warr (1900–1976) *John Colville (1894–1954) *Euan Wallace (1892–1941) *The Duke of Beaufort (1900–1984) *The Duke of Sutherland (1888–1963) *Hon.
